title: raybucks
author: raybucks
created_time: January 07, 2023, 08:48:37 AMLast edit: January 07, 2023, 09:35:11 AM by raybucks
content: I am from india and here brave rewards is not supported I i earned total of 50 bat token in 5 different brave profileso i want anyones gemini account from US to withdraw you can make totally new gemini account with no money no crypto in itor this 50bat token will be wasted I thought I giveaway

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Can't understand a word you just said, but maybe could help you , go there.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Don't get tricked by @OP, he was asking for $17 but he want to giving away $9 for free, it mean small money is really important for him.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 08:48:37 AMor this 50bat token will be wasted I thought I giveawayYou can use FixedFloat.com to exchange BATERC20 to something more useful, but you'll need to consolidate them in one wallet first.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on January 07, 2023, 08:59:43 AMCan't understand a word you just said, but maybe could help you , go there.Even though he is from India, I think what he wrote there is clear enough unless if you can't understand English. And I don't think that marketplace can help him. He isn't selling/trading or what but he just needs a help to pull out his money out Brave so I think this > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0 board could help him better.Quote from: Jawhead999 on January 07, 2023, 09:15:44 AMDon't get tricked by @OP, he was asking for $17 but he want to giving away $9 for free, it mean small money is really important for him.That's a different topic and this one here is also different plus I don't think he is giving away free money here. As he said, he only needs a Gemini account to withdraw his stuck BAT and then he might reward the person who will do this task.Quote from: LoyceV on January 08, 2023, 10:44:38 AMYou can use FixedFloat.com to exchange BATERC20 to something more useful, but you'll need to consolidate them in one wallet first.That's a good exchange platform but I don't think it's possible for him for now to send the BAT directly to that site but he first needs to withdraw it to Gemini (I think Uphold can also work) and once the token is in there, that would be the time that he can send it to a crypto exchange or to any crypto wallets.

comments.body: Quote from: redsun114 on January 09, 2023, 09:09:42 PMQuote from: Jawhead999 on January 07, 2023, 09:15:44 AMDon't get tricked by @OP, he was asking for $17 but he want to giving away $9 for free, it mean small money is really important for him.That's a different topic and this one here is also different plus I don't think he is giving away free money here. As he said, he only needs a Gemini account to withdraw his stuck BAT and then he might reward the person who will do this task.If you read this carefully, I think he wants to just give it awayQuote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 08:48:37 AMor this 50bat token will be wasted I thought I giveawayBut it is hard to know what his intentions are since he's been asking for no collateral loans for some time with his newbie account, even when he has been denied a previous loan.

comments.author: Susano
comments.body: If I may understand your point you want someone to give you a dollar account or wallet?

comments.author: nimvinhquang9a4
comments.body: wil you give me your 50 tokens if i use gemini ? can you be more detailed?

comments.author: showyoutv
comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 08:48:37 AMI am from india and here brave rewards is not supported I i earned total of 50 bat token in 5 different brave profileso i want anyones gemini account from US to withdraw you can make totally new gemini account with no money no crypto in itor this 50bat token will be wasted I thought I giveawayI can give you a website or 2 to donate to, and once it clears (up to 30 days or so), can either send back to a wallet of your choice, or exchange for anything else.Reach out if you wish, and good luck.
